body: im not sure why everyone says this has a happy ending ... ignoring that these kinds of relationships are inherently troublesome and doomed to disaster, it seems like hes only thinking about himself and being very manipulative. this relationship is doomed to be a disaster.
It's refreshing to see Ichihaya doujin with no dark twist in a while
When Ichihaya has a completely happy doujin it's a true treasure.
So the little girl actually like Jun because he returned something she lost before and then the guitar thing was just a plus wow. Happy end.

Hmm, you have a point there. Half- fucked is still better than 14,88/10 Ichihaya overkill HNNNNG WHY level of fucked up. His more questionable stuff is a strong vanilla antagonist, toxic to most people.

Y'all don't understand, Ichihaya has a quota of 'fucked' he has to meet, if you're reading one of his doujins and literally nothing bad has happened, a fucking dump truck is about to hit you. Good thing this wasn't the case =3
Thank fuck for the happy ending. The last one fucked me up
Another "not for academic purpose" doujin from Ichihaya. 15/10 for it being a happy ending one.
One thing that breaks my heart the most is when a loli's feelings get hurt. So I hope this nigga devotes his shit into that guitar otherwise Ichihaya gonna pull another dark twist again.
Refreshing to have a happy ending once in a while.
